description: A lightweight file explorer for the Pip-Boy 3000 Mk V. Browse your device's file system and interact with files directly.
instructions: Use the top-left or top-right rotary wheels or the front radio tuner to scroll. Press the left rotary wheel or front radio tuner to play or stop media. Press the top torch button to restart the device.
name: File Explorer
tip: Press play again to stop currently playing media.

description: Pip-Pong is a simple game where you control a paddle that hits a ball back and forth.
instructions: Use any knob to move up and down, and the top torch button to exit the game.
name: Pip-Pong

description: Pip-Snake is a simple game where you control a growing snake that eats food and avoids crashing into itself.
instructions: Use any knobs to move clockwise and counter-clockwise, the front radio tuner button to restart, and the top torch button to exit the game.
name: Pip-Snake
tip: The snake wraps around when it hits the edge of the screen.

description: The SPECIAL/Skills/Perks menu for the Pip-Boy 3000 Mk V.
instructions: Use the scroll wheel to navigate the menu and the right scroller to switch between screens. Clicking the wheel on a stat will allow you to edit its value. Clicking the wheel in the perks page takes you to the perk config screen - to save changes, scroll the right scroller.
name: Stats Display

description: Custom Radio lets you browse and play your own `.wav` music files directly from the `/RADIO` folder, giving you full control over your playlist.
instructions: Turn the top-left knob to scroll through songs. Press it to play or stop a track.
name: Custom Radio
tip: Avoid adding more than 50 songs to the `/RADIO` folder to keep performance smooth. Press the knob again to stop playback.

description: AsteroPIPs is a simple game where you control a spaceship to shoot and avoid space rocks.
instructions: Use the LEFT WHEEL BUTTON to start / shoot, TUNE KNOB UP and DOWN for rotate, and PUSH to move forward. TOP TORCH button to exit the game.
name: AsteroPIPs
tip: Move and shoot is a good tactic!

instructions: Press down the left wheel to launch the ball. Use the top-right wheel to move the paddle. Press the torch button to quit.
name: Vault Breaker
tip: Try to get the ball between or behind bricks!

instructions: Use the LEFT WHEEL to shift the table Up / Down, UPPER RIGHT WHEEL to shift Left / Right. Push LEFT WHEEL Click to Reset. Press TOP TORCH button to exit the game.
